Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a small flat base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The surface, which is red-pink, has been polished inside and burnished outside. Traces of a red slip are visible in certain areas. The bottom is slightly convex and the profile accentuates a slight asymmetry.
